title: Exponential Bases
text: For an exponential equation, if the the bases are the same then the exponents can be set equal to each other.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: To solve for $$x$$, set $$2x$$ and $$3x+2$$ equal to each other and isolate $$x$$ to be by itself.

title: Isolate $$x$$
text: Isolate $$x$$ by subtracting $$2x$$ from both sides, then bringing the $$2$$ to the left hand side.
